subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Marlies Schild of Austria won the first women’s World Cup slalom of the season, edging the Olympic champion Maria Riesch of Germany by three-hundredths of a second in Levi, Finland.
snippet: Marlies Schild of Austria won the first women’s World Cup slalom of the season, edging the Olympic champion Maria Riesch of Germany by three-hundredths of a second in Levi, Finland.
